original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2461)@</color>  召喚8個大型飛錘，以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(2736)@</color><color=#80cc00>武力</color>造成物理傷害，優先攻擊敵方建築物，並對建築物額外造成150%傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2461)@</color> Summon 8 large flying hammers to <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(2736) @</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> causes physical damage, prioritize attacks on enemy buildings, and cause 150% additional damage to buildings.
